column2: SELECT TOP # ----------------------------------------------------------------------- -- Photometric (photoObjAll) parameters ----------------------------------------------------------------------- p.objID, f.id as FIRST_ID, f.ra as FIRST_ra, f.dec as FIRST_dec, p.ra as SDSS_ra, p.dec as SDSS_dec, p.mode, p.type, p.clean, -- p.flags_u, p.flags_g, p.flags_r, p.flags_i, p.flags_z, -- PSF magnitude with errors p.psfMag_u, p.psfMag_g, p.psfMag_r, p.psfMag_i, p.psfMag_z, p.psfMagErr_u, p.psfMagErr_g, p.psfMagErr_r, p.psfMagErr_i, p.psfMagErr_z, -- Petrosian magnitude with errors p.petroMag_u, p.petroMag_g, p.petroMag_r, p.petroMag_i, p.petroMag_z, p.petroMagErr_u, p.petroMagErr_g, p.petroMagErr_r, p.petroMagErr_i, p.petroMagErr_z, --better of DeVaucouleurs/Exponential magnitude fit with errors p.modelMag_u, p.modelMag_g, p.modelMag_r, p.modelMag_i, p.modelMag_z, p.modelMagErr_u, p.modelMagErr_g, p.modelMagErr_r, p.modelMagErr_i, p.modelMagErr_z, -- Radius containing #% of Petrosian flux with errors p.petroR5#_u, p.petroR5#_g, p.petroR5#_r, p.petroR5#_i, p.petroR5#_z, p.petroR5#Err_u, p.petroR5#Err_g, p.petroR5#Err_r, p.petroR5#Err_i, p.petroR5#Err_z, -- Radius containing #% of Petrosian flux with errors p.petroR9#_u, p.petroR9#_g, p.petroR9#_r, p.petroR9#_i, p.petroR9#_z, p.petroR9#Err_u, p.petroR9#Err_g, p.petroR9#Err_r, p.petroR9#Err_i, p.petroR9#Err_z, -- Stokes Q and U parameters with errors p.q_u, p.q_g, p.q_r, p.q_i, p.q_z, p.qErr_u, p.qErr_g, p.qErr_r, p.qErr_i, p.qErr_z, p.u_u, p.u_g, p.u_r, p.u_i, p.u_z, p.uErr_u, p.uErr_g, p.uErr_r, p.uErr_i, p.uErr_z, ----------------------------------------------------------------------- -- PhotoZ paramters - Photometrically estimated redshifts and distances pz.objID, pz.z, pz.zErr, pz.distMod, pz.lumDist, -- Rest frame absolute magnitudes pz.absMagU, pz.absMagG, pz.absMagR, pz.absMagI, pz.absMagZ, -- Spectroscopic (SpecObjAll) parameters ----------------------------------------------------------------------- s.specObjID, s.bestObjID, s.z, s.zErr, s.sourcetype, s.class, s.subClass, s.velDisp, s.velDispErr, s.rChi2, s.elodieSpType, s.elodieBV, s.elodieTEff, s.elodieLogG, s.elodieFeH, s.elodieZ, s.elodieZErr, ----------------------------------------------------------------------- -- Galaxy Spectroscopic Line (GalSpecLines) parameters ----------------------------------------------------------------------- -- Equivalent widths and errors gl.h_alpha_eqw, gl.h_alpha_eqw_err, gl.h_beta_eqw, gl.h_beta_eqw_err, gl.h_gamma_eqw, gl.h_gamma_eqw_err, gl.neiii_#_eqw, gl.neiii_#_eqw_err, gl.oiii_#_eqw, gl.oiii_#_eqw_err, gl.oi_#_eqw, gl.oi_#_eqw_err, gl.oii_#_eqw, gl.oii_#_eqw_err, gl.oiii_#_eqw, gl.oiii_#_eqw_err, gl.nii_#_eqw, gl.nii_#_eqw_err, gl.sii_#_eqw, gl.sii_#_eqw_err, ----------------------------------------------------------------------- -- Emission Line fluxes and errors gl.h_alpha_flux, gl.h_alpha_flux_err, gl.h_beta_flux, gl.h_beta_flux_err, gl.h_gamma_flux, gl.h_gamma_flux_err, gl.neiii_#_flux, gl.neiii_#_flux_err, gl.oiii_#_flux, gl.oiii_#_flux_err, gl.oi_#_flux, gl.oi_#_flux_err, gl.oii_#_flux, gl.oii_#_flux_err, gl.oiii_#_flux, gl.oiii_#_flux_err, gl.nii_#_flux, gl.nii_#_flux_err, gl.sii_#_flux, gl.sii_#_flux_err ----------------------------------------------------------------------- -- Joining the various SDSS tables based on FIRST RA and Dec FROM MyDB.FIRST_Reduced_#p0#deg AS f OUTER APPLY dbo.fGetNearestObjEq (f.ra, f.dec, #) AS x JOIN PhotoObjAll p ON x.objID = p.objID LEFT OUTER JOIN PhotoZ pz ON p.objID = pz.objID LEFT OUTER JOIN SpecObjAll s ON p.objID = s.bestObjID LEFT OUTER JOIN GalSpecLine gl ON s.specobjid = gl.specobjid
